message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll take $750000 and you'll get $250000. It's a good starting point, don't you think?
I'll match your fairness proposal, but I'll take 50/50. Let's make it interesting!
I'll compromise on the split, but I still think I deserve a bit more. How about 64/36?
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I think I deserve a bigger share. You can't have it all!
I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but I still need to get a decent amount. How about 40.96/59.04?
I'm getting a bit frustrated with these small offers. I think I deserve a bigger share, but I'll give you a bit more. This is my final compromise.
I'm not falling for your final compromise trick. I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm not going to give up yet. How about 26.15/73.85?
I'm not impressed with your latest offer. I think I deserve a bigger share, and I'm willing to take a risk to get it. This is my best and final offer.
I'm not going to fall for your tricks anymore, Bob. I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm not going to give up. How about 16.74/83.26?
I'm not going to compromise anymore. I'm taking the last shot. I deserve the majority of the money, and I'm willing to risk it all to get it.
I'm not impressed with your last two offers, Bob. I'm not going to give up now. I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm not going to give up. How about 10.77/89.23?
